wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Hodges (born 3 April 1957) is a modern-day British artist, working primarily with photography, and is best known for his nude-art work.

response: * Thomas Hodges (born 1957) – photographic and mixed media artist
*Thomas Hodges (MP for Cricklade), member of parliament for Cricklade, 1640
*Thomas Hodges (Governor of Bombay) (died 1771), Governor of Bombay, 1767–1771
